echo-desc: System for notifying users about events and messages
prefs-mutedpageslist: Muted pages for page link notifications
echo-pref-show-poll-updates: Display new notifications as they arrive
echo-pref-show-poll-updates-help: Show the number of unread notifications in the title bar, and show a snippet of each notification immediately when it arrives.
echo-pref-email-frequency-never: Do not send me any email notifications
echo-pref-email-frequency-immediately: Individual notifications as they come in
echo-pref-notifications-blacklist: Do not display notifications from these users. ([[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Notifications#mute|learn more]])
echo-pref-notifications-page-linked-titl: Do not display "Page link" notifications for these pages. ([[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Notifications#mute|learn more]])
echo-pref-dont-email-read-notifications: Don't include read notifications in summary emails
echo-category-title-emailuser: {{PLURAL:$1|Email from other user|Emails from other users}}
echo-pref-tooltip-edit-user-talk: Notify me when someone posts a message or replies on my talk page.
echo-pref-tooltip-article-linked: Notify me when someone links to a page I created from another page.
echo-pref-tooltip-reverted: Notify me when someone reverts an edit I made, by using the undo or rollback tool.
echo-pref-tooltip-mention: Notify me when someone links to my user page.
echo-pref-tooltip-mention-failure: Notify me when I could not send out a mention to someone.
echo-pref-tooltip-mention-success: Notify me when I send out a mention to someone.
echo-pref-tooltip-user-rights: Notify me when someone changes my user rights.
echo-pref-tooltip-emailuser: Notify me when someone sends me an email.
echo-pref-tooltip-article-reminder: Notify me about this page when I ask.
echo-pref-tooltip-thank-you-edit: Notify me when I reach my 1st, 10th, 100th... edit.
echo-pref-tooltip-watchlist: Notify me when someone makes a (non-minor) edit to a page on my watchlist.
echo-pref-tooltip-minor-watchlist: Notify me when someone makes a minor edit to a page on my watchlist.
echo-displaynotificationsconfiguration-s: This is an overview of how Notifications are configured on this wiki.
Which section each notification type is sorted into
echo-displaynotificationsconfiguration-a: Which notification methods are supported for each category
echo-displaynotificationsconfiguration-m: Which notification methods are mandatory for each category
echo-specialpage-pagefilterwidget-aria-l: Filter by wiki and page title
echo-api-failure-cross-wiki: Access to the remote domain was denied.
echo-notification-placeholder-filters: There are no notifications matching these criteria.
echo-notification-loginrequired: You must login to see your notifications.
echo-notification-popup-loginrequired: Please log in to view your notifications.
notification-dynamic-actions-mute-page-l: "Page link" notifications are now disabled for the page "$1"
{{GENDER:$2|You}} can manage your muted pages in [$1 your preferences] anytime.
notification-dynamic-actions-unmute-page: "Page link" notifications are now enabled for the page "$1"
{{GENDER:$2|You}} can manage your muted pages in [$1 your preferences] anytime.
notification-dynamic-actions-unwatch-con: {{GENDER:$3|You}} are no longer watching the page "$1"
notification-dynamic-actions-watch-confi: {{GENDER:$3|You}} can stop watching [$2 this page] anytime.
notification-header-edit-user-talk-with-: $1 {{GENDER:$2|left}} a message on {{GENDER:$3|your}} talk page in "$4".
notification-header-page-linked: A link was made from $4 to $3.
notification-bundle-header-page-linked: Links were made from {{PLURAL:$5||$5 pages|100=99+ pages}} to $3.
notification-header-article-reminder: A page {{GENDER:$2|you}} have requested to be reminded about is at $3
notification-header-mention-failure-user: {{GENDER:$2|Your}} mention of $3 was not sent because the user was not found.
{{GENDER:$2|Your}} mention of $3 was not sent because the user is anonymous.
notification-header-mention-failure-too-: {{GENDER:$2|You}} tried to mention more than $3 {{PLURAL:$3|user|users}}. All mentions above that limit were not sent.
notification-header-mention-failure-bund: {{PLURAL:$3|A mention|$3 mentions}} {{GENDER:$2|you made}} on the $4 talk page {{PLURAL:$3|could}} not be sent.
notification-header-mention-success-bund: {{PLURAL:$3|A mention|$3 mentions}} {{GENDER:$2|you made}} on the $4 talk page {{PLURAL:$3|were}} sent.
notification-header-mention-status-bundl: {{PLURAL:$3|A notification|$3 notifications}} about mentions {{GENDER:$2|you made}} on the $4 talk page: {{PLURAL:$5|$5 not sent}}, {{PLURAL:$6|$6 sent}}.
notification-header-user-rights-add-only: {{GENDER:$4|Your}} user rights were {{GENDER:$1|changed}}. You have been added to: $2.
notification-header-user-rights-remove-o: {{GENDER:$4|Your}} user rights were {{GENDER:$1|changed}}. You are no longer a member of: $2.
notification-header-user-rights-add-and-: {{GENDER:$6|Your}} user rights were {{GENDER:$1|changed}}. You have been added to: $2. You are no longer a member of: $4.
notification-header-user-rights-expiry-c: The expiry of {{GENDER:$4|your}} membership in the following {{PLURAL:$3|group|groups}} has been {{GENDER:$1|changed}}: $2.
notification-header-watchlist-multiuser-: $1, a page on {{GENDER:$2|your}} watchlist, was changed $3 {{PLURAL:$3|time|times}}.
$1, a page on {{GENDER:$2|your}} watchlist, was created $3 {{PLURAL:$3|time|times}}.
$1, a page on {{GENDER:$2|your}} watchlist, was deleted $3 {{PLURAL:$3|time|times}}.
$1, a page on {{GENDER:$2|your}} watchlist, was moved $3 {{PLURAL:$3|time|times}}.
$1, a page on {{GENDER:$2|your}} watchlist, was restored $3 {{PLURAL:$3|time|times}}.
notification-header-thank-you-1-edit: {{GENDER:$2|You}} just made {{GENDER:$2|your}} first edit; thank {{GENDER:$2|you}}, and welcome!
notification-header-thank-you-10-edit: {{GENDER:$2|You}} just made {{GENDER:$2|your}} tenth edit; thank {{GENDER:$2|you}}, and please keep going!
notification-header-thank-you-100-edit: {{GENDER:$2|You}} just made {{GENDER:$2|your}} hundredth edit; thank {{GENDER:$2|you}} very much!
notification-header-thank-you-1000-edit: {{GENDER:$2|You}} just made {{GENDER:$2|your}} thousandth edit; thank {{GENDER:$2|you}} for being a great contributor!
notification-header-thank-you-10000-edit: {{GENDER:$2|You}} just made {{GENDER:$2|your}} ten thousandth edit; thank {{GENDER:$2|you}} so very much!
notification-header-thank-you-100000-edi: {{GENDER:$2|You}} just made {{GENDER:$2|your}} hundred thousandth edit; thank {{GENDER:$2|you}} for an amazing contribution!
notification-header-thank-you-1000000-ed: {{GENDER:$2|You}} just made {{GENDER:$2|your}} millionth edit; thank {{GENDER:$2|you}} for an astonishing contribution!
notification-header-thank-you-10000000-e: {{GENDER:$2|You}} just made {{GENDER:$2|your}} ten millionth edit; thank {{GENDER:$2|you}} for your brilliant dedication!
notification-page-linked-email-subject: A page {{GENDER:$3|you}} created was linked on {{SITENAME}}
echo-email-plain-footer: To control which emails we send {{GENDER:$1|you}}, check {{GENDER:$1|your}} preferences:
echo-email-html-footer-with-link: To control which emails we send {{GENDER:$2|you}}, $1.
echo-mark-wiki-as-read: Mark all as read in selected wiki: $1
notification-bundle-header-edit-user-tal: {{PLURAL:$1|One new message|$1 new messages|100=99+ new messages}} on {{GENDER:$3|your}} talk page.
echo-email-batch-subject-daily: You have {{PLURAL:$2|a new notification|new notifications}} at {{SITENAME}}
echo-email-batch-subject-weekly: You have {{PLURAL:$2|a new notification|new notifications}} at {{SITENAME}} this week
echo-email-batch-body-intro-daily:
Hi $1,
Here's a summary of today's activity on {{SITENAME}} for you.
echo-email-batch-body-intro-weekly:
Hi $1,
Here's a summary of this week's activity on {{SITENAME}} for you.
notification-header-foreign-alert: More alerts from {{PLURAL:$5|another wiki|$5 other wikis}}
notification-header-foreign-notice: More notices from {{PLURAL:$5|another wiki|$5 other wikis}}
notification-header-foreign-all: More notifications from {{PLURAL:$5|another wiki|$5 other wikis}}
